mapper.select: insert into insbpersonallotterycodeinfo (id,lotterycode,createcodetime,usetime,agentcode, agentname,sex,`status`,noti,period, createtime,modifytime) values (#{id},#{lotterycode},#{createcodetime},#{usetime},#{agentcode}, #{agentname},#{sex},#{status},#{noti},#{period}, #{createtime},#{modifytime})
SELECT count(1) AS cnt FROM insbpersonallotterycodeinfo WHERE createtime > #{start} AND createtime < #{end} ;

SELECT a.lotterycode AS lotteryCode, a.createcodetime AS createtime, a.period AS period, a.`status` AS `status`, a.agentcode AS agentCode, a.agentname AS agentName FROM insbpersonallotterycodeinfo a WHERE a.agentcode = #{agentCode};

SELECT a.lotterycode AS lotteryCode, a.createcodetime AS createtime, a.period AS period, a.`status` AS `status`, a.agentcode AS agentCode, a.agentname AS agentName FROM insbpersonallotterycodeinfo a WHERE a.status = '2';
